title: A Face in the Crowd
description: The fast-paced followup to Lynda La Plante’s first Prime Suspect thriller, Prime Suspect 2: A Face in the Crowd brings reunites readers with Detective Chief Inspector Jane Tennison as she hunts down a mysterious killer hidden amidst London’s dark streets and dockways—and as she continues to struggle against the male dominated politics of Scotland Yard. The no-nonsense detective will strike a chord with readers of Laura Lippman’s Tess Monaghan books or La Plante’s own Anna Travis mysteries, and will wow fans of the television series Bones, The Closer, and Law and Order: SVU.
author: Lynda La Plante
